original_title: DaVita ransomware attack exposes 916,000 patient records and data | Fox News
article_summary:
"DaVita Suffers Ransomware Attack Exposing Personal Data of Nearly 916,000 People"

"In a significant cybersecurity incident, kidney dialysis giant DaVita disclosed a ransomware attack that compromised sensitive personal and medical information of nearly 916,000 people. The attack, which occurred from March 24, 2025, to April 12, was claimed by the ransomware group Interlock."</s>
